short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant search results directly from your search bar, making your online experience faster and more productive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SpeedSearch transforms your searching experience by delivering instant search results directly from your search bar. 

Utilizing advanced algorithms, this extension provides quick access to websites and relevant information, making your online experience faster and more productive. The default search, powered by Yahoo, seamlessly integrates customizable options, including adult content filtering, timeframe filtering, allowed domains, and language settings, allowing you to tailor your search experience to your preferences.

Learn more: https://speed.kidsmode.app/
